column4: please. can anyone help me updating from 7.04 to 7.10 with the alternate cd
if you installed any software over the nete, you'll need net access to upgrade
yes, there's a bunch of stuff that's not on the cd, if you don't get them your install will break
for example, libc6 in gutsy is newer in gutsy; if an app you have installed requires that newer libc , it'll break unless you upgrade that as well.
